page.title: 03FORESTRY _ THE HIGH MEADOW 2
page.content: In the{Forest of Dean}as a whole the{ {Forestry Commission}employs about 80-90 manual staff and 13 people of manager grade. The head Office is in{ {Coleford}which is just outside our D block. The main job is to grow trees for timber but the Commission also looks after campsites{(Bracelands),}forest trails, car parks and controls wildlife with specially trained rangers. The wood is sold for (in ascending order of value): 1.{Firewood { } 2.{Pulp wood}(paper, chipboard) 3.{Pallet wood}(making pallets) 4.{Fencing { }5.{Saw timber}(sent to mills) 6.{Masts for yachts}(larch) 7.{Decorative veneer}(timber of high quality).
